entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 12:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -22.1°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
